channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Sifo for Svenska Dagbladet, 5–15 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 28.1–29.9%
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 22.3–24.0%
  • Sverigedemokraterna (EFDD): 15.2–16.6%
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 3.4–4.2%
  • Centerpartiet (ALDE): 9.4–10.6%
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 7.2–8.3%
  • Liberalerna (ALDE): 4.0–4.8%
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 2.7–3.4%
  • Feministiskt initiativ (S&D): 1.6–2.1%
